name: Skrie Salmon
author: SKRIE
summary: Skrie doesn't mean anything, but this fish sure deserves a cool name. The recipe calls for anise seed, but the taste is not overpowering. Instead, it complements the lemon flavor.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a small saucepan, stir together anise seeds and mint
Stir in 1 cup water, and bring to a boil over high heat
Boil 5 minutes, then stir in honey
Continue to boil until most of the water has boiled off
Remove from heat, and stir in remaining 1/4 cup water
Place lemon strips in a bowl, and pour melted butter over the strips
Place in a preheated oven, and bake until done, about 15 minutes
Remove from oven, and brush liberally with lemon butter
